self.nodePath.setZ(self.nodePath, z)
        self.nodePath.setH(self.nodePath, h)
        self.orbitNode(rx, ry, 0)
        pos = self.nodePath.getPos(self.refCS)
        if Vec3(pos).length() < 0.005:
            pos.set(0, -0.01, 0)
        # Now move on out
        pos.assign(pos * (1 + r))
        self.nodePath.setPos(self.refCS, pos)
